name: kioskorders
description: 1. Go to Firebase Console: https://console.firebase.google.com/ 2. Create a new project or use the test project provided. 3. Add an iOS app to the project with bundle ID `com.vivvi.KioskOrders`. 4. Download the `GoogleService-Info.plist` file. 5. Place the file in your local Xcode project under `KioskOrders/` (same level as .xcodeproj). 6. Make sure the file is named exactly: `GoogleService-Info.plist`. 7. Build and run the project.
